column5: It's hard to believe people would do this.  Invasive species are no joke!  I don't imagine that these things could survive the cold water in the winter but still, pretty stupid!  http://worldnewsdailyreport.com/pranksters-arrested-after-introducing-piranhas-to-great-lakes/  Okay, the above link is to a fake news site.  I didn't know that when I posted it.
I wouldn't worry too much as the Asian Carp will probably get them. HH

The World News Daily makes the National Enquirer look legit....that story is on the same page as the FDA approved tranquilizer gun for children and the 40 pound baby born to the 600 pound woman....  It is not reported anywhere else so I'm pretty sure it's a hoax.  They got me too....
Should I switch out my flouro for wire leader?
Ah hell, I didn't notice that.  Thanks for pointing that out.  I should have double checked it before posting.  Feel like an idiot now.  Oh Well !!

Ah hell, I didn't notice that.  Thanks for pointing that out.  I should have double checked it before posting.  Feel like an idiot now.  Oh Well !!  No worries, I did the same thing on another site...LOL at myself I guess.
Guess I can stop being excited about the 90 years lost in the bermuda triangle coal ship they found in cuba....  Michael
Tons of that crap around. Snopes is your friend...check'em out.
Who needs piranhas when you got snakeheads?    Art
Seemed like a legit story......  Oh and hey guys check out the pike I caught this morning....    :tease:
Holy frig!!!  That pike was caught on at least 60 different lakes hahaha  Where is its legs?

Seemed like a legit story......  Oh and hey guys check out the pike I caught this morning....  bigpike.jpg  :tease:   Those are the small ones that don't make the size limit in that lake......I could tell you boys what lake that is but then I would have to kill ya.....  BTW a few pirhannas might be a good idea to keep people from swimming in areas where it's not allowed.
Think it was finally confirmed that big pike was caught in Italy.

All I know for sure.. my youngest was fishing for Piranha with raw chicken two days ago and had them for supper to do her part to eradicate them. Of course she was in the rain forest of Peru to do so....
She should of just ate the chicken as it much better.
